member.name: T:PX.Commerce.Core.BCSyncStatus
member.summary: Represents a main synchronization status entry. Describes the state of an object which indicates the following properties: whether the object was synchronized or not, whether the object requires re-synchronization, whether the object synchronization failed, or the object was filtered out from the list of objects for synchronization. The entries of this object are displayed on the Process Data (BC501500) and Sync History (BC301000) forms. A user can edit or create new statuses manually on the Sync History (BC301000) form.

member.name: T:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterStatus
member.summary: The enumeration determines the result of filtering operation.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterStatus.Filtered
member.value: The record is filtered and won't be synchronized automatically, but can be synchronized manually. The status can be applied by code or throught the user filtering.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterStatus.Invalid
member.value: The record is filtered and cannot be synchronized. The status can be applied by code.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterStatus.Ignore
member.value: The record is processes should not appear in the sync history at all. This status is used by code.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterStatus.None
member.value: No filtering criteria is applied to the record. The record will be processed further.

member.name: T:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterMode
member.summary: The enumeration determines the filtering operation mode.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterMode.New
member.value: The filtering will be applied to the new record that was not synchronized previously

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterMode.Existing
member.value: The filtering will be applied to the existing record that was synchronized previoulsy

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.FilterMode.Merge
member.value: The filtering will be applied to the existing record during the merge of duplicates.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.PrepareMode.Incremental
member.value: Fetch the entities to determine which of them need to be synchronized based on the last incremental operation timestamp.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.PrepareMode.Reconciliation
member.value: Fetch the entities to determine which of them need to be synchronized based on the timestamps the user provides in the UI.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.PrepareMode.Full
member.value: Fetch all entities to determine which of them need to be synchronized based on the timestamps the user provides in the UI.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.PrepareMode.None
member.value: Skip the fetch operation.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.SyncMode.Changed
member.value: Synchronize entities that the processor logic detected for synchronization.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.SyncMode.Force
member.value: Force the synchronization operation.

member.name: F:PX.Commerce.Core.SyncMode.None
member.value: Skip the synchronization operation.
